# gitea_org_actions_secret (Resource)

Manages an organization actions secret in Gitea. Organization secrets are available to all repositories within the organization for GitHub Actions workflows.

## Import

Organization action secrets can be imported using the format `org/secretName`:

```shell
terraform import gitea_org_actions_secret.example myorg/MY_SECRET
```

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "gitea_org_actions_secret" "example" {
  org         = "myorg"
  name        = "MY_SECRET"
  data        = "secret-value"
  description = "Example organization secret for GitHub Actions"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `data` (String, Sensitive) The secret value. This is sensitive and will not be displayed in logs or state output.
- `name` (String) Name of the secret. Must be unique within the organization and cannot exceed 30 characters.
- `org` (String) Name of the organization that owns the secret.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Optional description of what this secret is used for.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the secret was created in RFC3339 format.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
# Import an existing organization actions secret using the format: org/secretName
terraform import gitea_org_actions_secret.example myorg/MY_SECRET
```
